title: Logging on.. I stuck there and it won't let me get in
body: I recently updated to window 7 and update everything to date. I downloaded lol and tried to log in it said Authentication success checking for logging queue status, and then logging on... stuck there for a momment then Connection Error( click ok the client exit) i click repair and it didn't help, i tried delete the folders and make it redownload but no it didn't help please help me , i played 5000 games ( 1300 ranked ) alone this server, i started when season 3 started i love this game please help me......

replies.body:
Hey NarutoBoy1998,

I have seen this issue before.  Typically, this issue is caused by two different reasons:

1. An unstable connection
1. A 3rd party security program that is blocking League of Legends.

Because of this, I strongly recommend that you perform all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base Article that should resolve this type of issue:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22114820-Firewall-Configuration-for-League-of-Legends

If you are still experiencing issues, even after completing all of the steps found in this guide, then please do not hesitate to submit a ticket to Player Support:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

When you do, make sure to include the following information in your ticket:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log 

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
